entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a student who is eating chicken-and-ham pie and discussing Voldemort's capabilities.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as a pale but determined student who is sitting opposite Harry and trying to convince him that people should know about Voldemort's capabilities.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone capable of terrible things, and his Death Eaters are also mentioned.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as a student who has not yet had dinner because of Quidditch practice.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone waiting for Ron to have dinner.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is described as a student who looks up at Harry but quickly returns to his plate when caught looking.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is mentioned as walking into the hall with her friend Marietta.

entities.name: marietta
entities.description: Marietta is described as Cho Chang's friend who walks into the hall with her.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Voldemort's capabilities and wants people to know what he is capable of.
Neville is trying to convince Harry that people should know about Voldemort's capabilities.
Ron is involved in Quidditch practice and has not yet had dinner because of it.
Hermione is waiting for Ron to have dinner.
